content: By Jennifer Saba Sumner Redstone's state of health is ailing the corporate governance at CBS and Viacom. The media mogul's mental capacity is being called into question again  this time by an ex-girlfriend in a lawsuit filed last week. Shareholders of both companies  which Redstone controls and chairs  deserve a clearer idea of whether the 92-year-old is fit to lead the boards.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Breakingviews: Sumner Redstone's health ails corporate governance

content: Oct 16 Cablevision Systems Inc and Viacom Inc have settled an antitrust lawsuit in which Cablevision had accused Viacom of forcing distributors and subscribers to buy channels they did not want.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Cablevision  Viacom settle bundling lawsuit

content: Sept 30 MTV  a unit of Viacom Inc  named on Wednesday Sean Atkins as its president.
name: Viacom Inc
title: MTV names Sean Atkins as president

content: Sept 30 MTV  the music and reality-TV focused television network owned by Viacom Inc  on Wednesday named veteran media executive Sean Atkins as its president.
name: Viacom Inc
title: UPDATE 1-MTV names Sean Atkins as president

content: LOS ANGELES  Sept 29 Cablevision Systems Inc  and Viacom Inc are discussing a possible settlement of an antitrust lawsuit in which the cable operator accuses Viacom of forcing distributors and subscribers to buy channels they do not want  a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Cablevision  Viacom in settlement talks over bundling lawsuit -source

content: LOS ANGELES  Sept 29 Cablevision Systems Inc  and Viacom Inc are discussing a possible settlement of an antitrust lawsuit in which the cable operator accuses Viacom of forcing distributors and subscribers to buy channels they do not want  a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
name: Viacom Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Cablevision  Viacom in settlement talks over bundling lawsuit -source

content: * Said on Wednesday announces partnership with Viacom  in Latin America
name: Viacom Inc
title: BRIEF-Myriad Group announces partnership with Viacom in Latin America

content: * Indexes finish down: Dow 0.69 pct  S&P 0.78 pct  Nasdaq 1.62 pct   (Updates to close  adds detail on Zynga)
name: Viacom Inc
title: US STOCKS-Media stock selloff leaves Wall Street bruised

content: Aug 6 U.S. media stocks have taken an indiscriminate beating this week  but many big fund managers still like entertainment conglomerate Walt Disney Co  while turning negative for the long term on Discovery Communications  owner of several niche television franchises.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Despite media stock beat down  Disney stands tall with U.S. funds

content: * Indexes down: Dow 0.7 pct  S&P 0.75 pct  Nasdaq 1.53 pct   (Updates to mid-afternoon)
name: Viacom Inc
title: US STOCKS-Wall St slumps as media stocks hemorrhage

content: * Indexes down: Dow 0.72 pct  S&P 0.82 pct  Nasdaq 1.61 pct   (Updates to early afternoon)
name: Viacom Inc
title: US STOCKS-Wall St slumps as media stocks bleed

content: * Shares fall as much as 18 pct   (Adds details  background; updates shares)
name: Viacom Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Viacom revenue miss adds to concerns over U.S. cable companies

content: MILAN  July 31 European pay TV company Sky  has agreed to buy Italy's MTV free-to-air channel from U.S. media group Viacom  a move that could pressure local market leader Mediaset.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Sky Italia agrees to buy Viacom's MTV Italia

content: Aug 6 Viacom Inc's revenue fell 10.6 percent in the third quarter  hurt by lower revenue from the company's films business as there were no major movie releases in the quarter.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Viacom's quarterly revenue falls 10.6 pct

content: July 21 Pop singer Taylor Swift  British singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran  R&B singer Beyonce  and DJ-producer Mark Ronson lead the nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards  the cable network said on Tuesday.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Taylor Swift  Ed Sheeran lead MTV Video Music Award nominations

content: April 7 Shares of MTV owner Viacom Inc  slipped on Tuesday  a day after the company hit the pause button on a $20 billion share buyback program and announced slew of restructuring steps that will result in a charge of $785 million.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Viacom shares slip on bigger-than-expected charge  buyback halt

content: U.S. media company Viacom Inc  said it will undertake a restructuring  including cutting jobs  abandoning some acquired titles and reorganizing three of its domestic network groups into two new organizations  to drive growth.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Viacom to cut jobs  abandon titles  reorganize network groups

content: April 6 Media company Viacom Inc said it will reorganize three of its domestic network groups into two new organizations as part of a restructuring to drive growth.
name: Viacom Inc
title: Viacom to reorganize three domestic network groups to drive growth

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  February 27 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has published its new Rating  Navigators for the following North American diversified Media companies: --CBS Corporation --Cox Enterprises  Inc. --Discovery Communications LLC --NBCUniversal Media LLC --Time Warner Inc. --Twenty-First Century Fox  Inc. --Viacom  Inc. --The Walt Disney Company  Inc.  These Rating Navigators should be read in tandem with its companion report  entitled 'Media:  R
name: Viacom Inc
title: Fitch Publishes Rating Navigators for U.S. Diversified Media Companies

content: Jan 29 Viacom Inc is jumping on the direct-to-consumer bandwagon with plans to introduce an online video streaming product for its children's cable network Nickelodeon  the company's chief executive said on Thursday.
name: Viacom Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Viacom to launch video streaming service for Nickelodeon

content: Jan 26 The Raine Group  a boutique merchant bank focused on the technology  media and telecoms sector  plans to hire Viacom's former CEO Tom Freston as a senior adviser  the New York Times reported.
name: Viacom Inc
title: MOVES-Raine Group to hire former Viacom CEO Tom Freston as adviser - NYT
